objective.description: Primary marketing objective for the campaign (e.g., awareness, conversion, engagement)

start_date.description: Campaign start date in YYYY-MM-DD format

end_date.description: Campaign end date in YYYY-MM-DD format

budget_currency.description: Currency in which the budget of this campaign is expressed

budget_total.description: Total budget allocated for the campaign in the base currency

agency_id.description: Unique identifier for the agency managing the campaign

agency_name.description: Name of the agency managing the campaign

product_id.description: Unique identifier for the product being advertised

product_name.description: Name of the product being advertised

product_description.description: Detailed description of the product being advertised

campaign_type_id.description: Unique identifier for the campaign type classification

campaign_type_name.description: Name of the campaign type (e.g., Brand Awareness, Performance, Retargeting)

target_audiences.description: List of target audiences for the campaign

description.description: Detailed description of the target audience

demo_age_start.description: Minimum age of the target audience (inclusive)

demo_age_end.description: Maximum age of the target audience (inclusive)

demo_attributes.description: Additional demographic attributes (e.g., income level, education, occupation)

interest_attributes.description: Interest-based attributes and behaviors that define the audience

intent_attributes.description: Purchase intent and behavioral intent signals

purchase_attributes.description: Purchase behavior and transaction history attributes

exclusion_list.description: List of segments or attributes to exclude from the audience

extension_approach.description: Approach for audience extension (e.g., lookalike, similar audiences)

population_size.description: Estimated size of the target audience population

target_locations.description: List of target locations for the campaign

description.description: Detailed description of the target location

location_list.description: List of specific locations to target (based on location_type)

exclusion_list.description: List of specific locations to exclude (based on exclusion_type)

population_percent.description: Estimated percentage of the total target population that can be targeted in this target location, expressed as a decimal between 0 and 1 (e.g., 0.452 for 45.2%)

workflow_status_id.description: Unique identifier for the current workflow status

workflow_status_name.description: Human-readable name of the current workflow status (e.g., Draft, Approved, Live, Paused, Completed)

kpi_name1.description: Name of the first key performance indicator. Should reference a standard metric (e.g., metric_impressions, metric_clicks, metric_leads) or custom metric (e.g., metric_custom1) from the lineitem schema.

kpi_value1.description: Target value for the first key performance indicator

kpi_name2.description: Name of the second key performance indicator. Should reference a standard metric (e.g., metric_impressions, metric_clicks, metric_leads) or custom metric (e.g., metric_custom1) from the lineitem schema.

kpi_value2.description: Target value for the second key performance indicator

kpi_name3.description: Name of the third key performance indicator. Should reference a standard metric (e.g., metric_impressions, metric_clicks, metric_leads) or custom metric (e.g., metric_custom1) from the lineitem schema.

kpi_value3.description: Target value for the third key performance indicator

kpi_name4.description: Name of the fourth key performance indicator. Should reference a standard metric (e.g., metric_impressions, metric_clicks, metric_leads) or custom metric (e.g., metric_custom1) from the lineitem schema.

kpi_value4.description: Target value for the fourth key performance indicator

kpi_name5.description: Name of the fifth key performance indicator. Should reference a standard metric (e.g., metric_impressions, metric_clicks, metric_leads) or custom metric (e.g., metric_custom1) from the lineitem schema.

kpi_value5.description: Target value for the fifth key performance indicator

dim_custom1.description: Custom dimension field 1 - configuration defined in dictionary schema

dim_custom2.description: Custom dimension field 2 - configuration defined in dictionary schema

dim_custom3.description: Custom dimension field 3 - configuration defined in dictionary schema

dim_custom4.description: Custom dimension field 4 - configuration defined in dictionary schema

dim_custom5.description: Custom dimension field 5 - configuration defined in dictionary schema

custom_properties.description: Extensible JSON dictionary for storing custom metadata, settings, or metrics that don't fit elsewhere in the schema
